body_html:
It looks that in pytorch==0.4 (after merge) this issue is still valid.

Also when trying to deepcopy a model, accumulated gradients for parameters are not preserved (which is not a significant problem)
body_text:
It looks that in pytorch==0.4 (after merge) this issue is still valid.
Also when trying to deepcopy a model, accumulated gradients for parameters are not preserved (which is not a significant problem)
body:
It looks that in pytorch==0.4 (after merge) this issue is still valid. 

Also when trying to deepcopy a model, accumulated gradients for parameters are not preserved (which is not a significant problem)
